tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tracking_changes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    change_id INT NOT NULL,
    change_date DATE NOT NULL,
    modified_table VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    modification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tracking_changes_to_database_schema (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    change_type VARCHAR,
    change_description TEXT,
    change_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE authorized_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR UNIQUE,
    role VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE schema_modification_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    table_modified VARCHAR,
    modification_type VARCHAR,
    modified_by VARCHAR,
    modification_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE schema_changes (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    table_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE authorized_users (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE unauthorized_access (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    ip_address VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE change_approval (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    change_id INT,
    approver_id INT,
    approved BOOLEAN
)
